farmcity.ui

Class FarmUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.ui.FarmUI

  • public class FarmUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This user interface (UI) represent the Farm Menu of the game, which is displayed after the player chooses to visit his farm in the main menu. This UI consists of functions for the player to plant a new Crop on one of his Plot, clear wilted crop(s) or harvest all of the harvestable crop(s)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FarmUI(Player player)
      This constructor initializes the ManageFarmController object by passing in the player object which represents the current player

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearPlotProcess(int plotNum)
      This method allows a user to clear a wilted Crop on one of his/ her Plot at his/ her choice.
      void displayPercentage()
      This method displays the status of the player's plots (the Crop planted, the percentage growth or the status of the plot) and prints the graphical representation of the farm to user's screen
      void execute()
      This method executes Farm Menu and prints out the UI to user's screen for him/ her to choose what he/ she wants to do.
      void harvestCropProcess(Player player)
      This method allows a user to harvest all his crops that are ready for harvest It passes in a player object to get the lsit of player objects and then returns a String will proceed to clearCrop function in manageFarmController to clear the crop
      void plantCropProcess(int plotNum)
      This method allows a user to plant a Crop on one of his/ her Plot at his/ her choice.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FarmUI

        public FarmUI(Player player)
        This constructor initializes the ManageFarmController object by passing in the player object which represents the current player
        Parameters:
        player - The current player

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute()
        This method executes Farm Menu and prints out the UI to user's screen for him/ her to choose what he/ she wants to do. Then it takes in player's input and proceed to the corresponding method or exit to main menu.

      • displayPercentage

        public void displayPercentage()
        This method displays the status of the player's plots (the Crop planted, the percentage growth or the status of the plot) and prints the graphical representation of the farm to user's screen

      • plantCropProcess

        public void plantCropProcess(int plotNum)
                      throws CityException
        This method allows a user to plant a Crop on one of his/ her Plot at his/ her choice. It takes in the plot Number which represents the Plot and ask the player for the type of Crop that he/ she wants to plant on that Plot if the Plot is valid. Then the method will proceed to plantCrop function in manageFarmController to plant the crop or go back to the main menu depends on player's choice
        Parameters:
        plotNum - the plot number which represents the plot.
        Throws:
        CityException - If the plant Crop process is unsuccessful, throws CityException

      • clearPlotProcess

        public void clearPlotProcess(int plotNum)
                      throws CityException
        This method allows a user to clear a wilted Crop on one of his/ her Plot at his/ her choice. It takes in the plot Number which represents the Plot and will proceed to clearCrop function in manageFarmController to clear the crop
        Parameters:
        plotNum - the plot number which represents the plot.
        Throws:
        CityException - If the clear Crop process is unsuccessful, throws CityException

      • harvestCropProcess

        public void harvestCropProcess(Player player)
                        throws CityException
        This method allows a user to harvest all his crops that are ready for harvest It passes in a player object to get the lsit of player objects and then returns a String will proceed to clearCrop function in manageFarmController to clear the crop
        Parameters:
        player - Represet the Player object that will have its crops harvested
        Throws:
        CityException - If the harvest Crop process is unsuccessful, throws CityException
